title: Authors and Citation
text: Saldanha R (2024). gitrep: Reports Git Repositories. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://rfsaldanha.github.io/gitrep/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {gitrep: Reports From Git Repositories},   author = {Raphael Saldanha},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://rfsaldanha.github.io/gitrep/}, }

what: Render a Git repository report — report
title: Render a Git repository report — report
Render a Git repository report — report
code: report(   after,   until = Sys.Date(),   max = 1e+09,   repo = ".",   output_dir = tempdir(),   output_file = "report.html",   files_stats = FALSE,   render_quiet = TRUE )

title: Render a Git repository report — report
text: character. Starting date. character. Ending data. Defaults today. max numeric. Maximum number commits retrieve. Defaults 1e+9. repo character. Repository path computer. Defaults active repository. can also provide SSH repository address temporally cloned. output_dir character. Output directory. Defaults temporary dir. output_file character. Output report name. Defaults report.html. files_stats logical. Fetch file stats. Can take longer large repos. Defaults FALSE. render_quiet logical. Show report rendering messages. Defaults FALSE.

title: Render a Git repository report — report
